generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, including a curved arrow and a Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area adjacent to the road, separated by a curb and some barriers, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a large gray building on the left, a brown building in the middle, and a yellow building on the right, all with windows and architectural features.
- fence: A yellow and red striped fence is visible on the right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including a tall pole with a traffic sign on the right and a shorter pole with a sign on the left.
- traffic sign: A blue and white traffic sign indicating a no-entry zone is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible on the left side of the image, with green leaves.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- motorcycle: A black motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk near the yellow building on the right.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked near the gray building on the left.
